definition: to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: Sick in Brazil Clay Cross, has gone through many hardships.
sentences.chinese: 克萊在巴西貧病交加，也歷盡磨練。

sentences.english: Beethoven's very miserable old age, died in sick Cross.
sentences.chinese: 貝多芬的晚年十分淒涼，在貧病交加中死去。

sentences.english: Klein in Brazil sick Cross also experienced the ordeal.
sentences.chinese: 克萊在巴西貧病交加，也歷盡磨難。

sentences.english: In the old society, the labouring people suffered from poverty and illness .
sentences.chinese: 在舊社會，勞動人民貧病交加。
